panels.description: The recent CPU usage for the whole system, JVM process and the average CPU usage for JVM process.
panels.title: CPU

panels.description: The sum of the number of runnable entities queued to available processors and the number of runnable entities running on the available processors averaged over a period of time.
panels.title: Load

panels.description: The current number of live threads including both daemon and non-daemon threads, and peak live thread count since the Java virtual machine started or peak was reset.
panels.title: Threads

panels.description: The open and maximum file descriptor count.
panels.title: File Descriptors

panels.description: Incoming HTTP requests count.
panels.title: Requests / Min

panels.description: Incoming HTTP request duration.

targets.expr: round(histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by (le) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{groupId="$group_id",artifactId="$artifact_id",mam_dc=~"$datacenter",mam_stage=~"$stage",mam_brand=~"$brand",app_kubernetes_io_version=~"$version",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$interval]))) * 1000) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Median Request Duration (ms)

panels.description: Server error count (5xx).
panels.title: Server Errors / Min

panels.description: Client errors count (4xx).
panels.title: Client Errors / Min

panels.description: Count of the slow requests with duration over 1s.

targets.expr: sum(round(sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{groupId="$group_id",artifactId="$artifact_id",mam_dc=~"$datacenter",mam_stage=~"$stage",mam_brand=~"$brand",app_kubernetes_io_version=~"$version",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$interval]) * 60) - sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{groupId="$group_id",artifactId="$artifact_id",mam_dc=~"$datacenter",mam_stage=~"$stage",mam_brand=~"$brand",app_kubernetes_io_version=~"$version",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",le="1.0"}[$interval]) * 60))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Slow Requests (>1s) / Min

panels.description: Incoming HTTP requests count per client application.
panels.title: Requests per App / Min

panels.description: Incoming HTTP requests count per REST resource.
panels.title: Requests per Resource / Min

panels.description: Log events count.
panels.title: Log Events / Min

panels.description: The total amount of used, committed and maximum memory.
panels.title: JVM Total

panels.description: The amount of used, committed and maximum heap memory.
panels.title: JVM Heap

panels.description: The amount of used, committed and maximum non-heap memory.
panels.title: JVM Non-Heap

panels.description: The amount of used, committed and maximum eden space heap memory.
panels.title: Eden Space

panels.description: The amount of used, committed and maximum old generation heap memory.
panels.title: Old Generation

panels.description: The amount of used, committed and maximum survivor space heap memory.
panels.title: Survivor Space

panels.description: The amount of used, committed and maximum metaspace memory.
panels.title: Metaspace

panels.description: The amount of used, committed and maximum compressed class space memory.
panels.title: Compressed Class Space

panels.description: The amount of used, committed and maximum code cache memory.
panels.title: Code Cache

panels.description: An estimate of the memory that the JVM is using and of the total capacity of direct buffer pool.
panels.title: Direct Buffers Size

panels.description: An estimate of the number of direct buffers in the pool.
panels.title: Direct Buffers Count

panels.description: An estimate of the memory that the JVM is using and of the total capacity of mapped buffer pool.
panels.title: Mapped Buffers Size

panels.description: An estimate of the number of mapped buffers in the pool.
panels.title: Mapped Buffers Count

panels.description: Number of GC occurrence per minute.
panels.title: Collections / Min

panels.description: The size of the young generation memory pool and the count of positive increases in the size of the old generation memory pool before and after garbage collections.
panels.title: Allocation/Promotion

panels.description: Size of old generation memory pool after a full GC and max size of old generation memory pool.
panels.title: Live/Max Data Size

panels.description: Average and max pause duration.
panels.title: Pause Durations

panels.description: The number of classes that are currently loaded in the JVM.
panels.title: Classes Loaded

panels.description: JVM class load and unload rate.
panels.title: Class Load/Unload Rate
